Posted By: TheWrathofShane (11/4/2012 9:56:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
How this card has managed to hover just above 1/5 is beyond me. [Brute Force](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brute Force) is +3/+3 for ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol). This is +2/+0 for ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol). The only thing I would ever use this card for is as a coaster... and even *then* I'm probably better off spilling my drink all over my table than letting this card touch it.  
  
As a side note, [Dynacharge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dynacharge) is also pretty bad but still does this much better by combining it with [Trumpet Blast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Trumpet Blast). Talk about adding insult to injury.
posts.html:
How this card has managed to hover just above 1/5 is beyond me. Brute Force is +3/+3 for . This is +2/+0 for . The only thing I would ever use this card for is as a coaster... and even then I'm probably better off spilling my drink all over my table than letting this card touch it.

As a side note, Dynacharge is also pretty bad but still does this much better by combining it with Trumpet Blast. Talk about adding insult to injury.
